code doc generation



DocP

typedef void DocP;
type: C typedef
description: Documentation project handle

DocElementType

type: C enum
description: types of documentation elements available
DOC_CMAKE_MACRO
DOC_C_DEFINE
DOC_C_FUNCTION
DOC_C_FUNCTION_POINTER
DOC_C_STRUCT
DOC_C_UNION
DOC_C_ENUM
DOC_C_TYPEDEF
DOC_C_VARIABLE
DOC_C_CODE
DOC_TEXT
DOC_COUNT

util_doc_type_from_string

DocElementType util_doc_type_from_string(const char *text);
type: C function
description: return doc element type from string

util_doc_create

DocP *util_doc_create(const char *name, const char *description, const char *signature);
type: C function
description: create documentation project

util_doc_delete

void  util_doc_delete(DocP *handle);
type: C function
description: delete documentation project

util_doc_parse_c_files

bool  util_doc_parse_c_files(DocP *handle, const char *module_name, const char *path);
type: C function
description: parse a folder for c files

util_doc_parse_cmake_files

bool  util_doc_parse_cmake_files(DocP *handle, const char *module_name, const char *path);
type: C function
description: parse a folder for cmake files

util_doc_add_module

bool  util_doc_add_module(DocP *handle, const char *name, const char *description);
type: C function
description: add a doc module to project

util_doc_add_section

bool  util_doc_add_section(DocP *handle, const char *module, const char *name, const char *description);
type: C function
description: add a doc section to a doc module

util_doc_add_element

bool  util_doc_add_element(DocP *handle, const char *module, const char *section, DocElementType type, const char *name, const char *description, const char *content);
type: C function
description: add a c code element to a doc section

util_doc_add_c_file

bool  util_doc_add_c_file(DocP *handle, const char *module, const char *path);
type: C function
description: add a c file header to a module

util_doc_add_cmake_file

bool  util_doc_add_cmake_file(DocP *handle, const char *module, const char *path);
type: C function
description: add a cmake file to a module

util_doc_generate

bool  util_doc_generate(DocP *handle, const char *output_dir);
type: C function
description: generate HTML for documentation project
